channel.title: Crossfade Loop Sample Player
channel.description: When producing music in Ableton I love to take samples of one note, drop them in sampler, set loop and crossfade and have a nice continuous tone as basis of a patch. Is there such a thing in axoloti? Any Ideas how to patch this? Maybe to sample players that crossfade between each other?

item.title: Crossfade Loop Sample Player
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

When producing music in Ableton I love to take samples of one note, drop them in sampler, set loop and crossfade and have a nice continuous tone as basis of a patch.

Is there such a thing in axoloti? Any Ideas how to patch this? Maybe to sample players that crossfade between each other?
